line_1: If learn'd, their pride, if weak, their zeal she dreads,
line_2: And their hearts 'weakness, who have soundest heads:

line_1: Pass We the Ills, which each Man feels or dreads,
line_2: The Weight or fall'n, or hanging o'er our Heads;

line_1: When Pindus' self approaching ruin dreads,
line_2: Shakes all his pines and bows his hundred heads;
